Header.title: QUEEN HEALTHCARE AGENCY
Header.paragraph: With over 10 years of experience in healthcare, we know the sector inside out and are experts in the field. By focusing on the uniqueness, needs, and personality of our clients, we ensure that we find the best fit and expert careers for a broad range of healthcare services.

About.paragraph: Queen Healthcare Agency offers peace of mind to both healthcare service providers and those searching for new opportunities in helping them to find the fit they're looking for. We offer an array of roles, including working with both the old and young, in public and private healthcare settings, and in home care settings. We also provide opportunities to locum doctors, nurses, carers, pharmacists, pharmacy technicians and optometrists, as well as in the areas of physiotherapy and occupational health.

Services.name: NURSES
Services.text: Queen Health Care is dedicated to offering high quality, client-centered services that support people's freedom, autonomy, and inclusion.

Services.name: HOMECARE SERVICE
Services.text: Queen Health Care provides customized services  for elderly people who need our support which help them to have a happy and great life.

Services.name: CLEANING STAFF
Services.text: Nursing homes all throughout Ireland can avail of the entire spectrum of contract cleaning services offered by Queen health care on a daily, weekly, and monthly basis.

Services.name: KITCHEN STAFF
Services.text: Queen Health Care is an expert in providing staffing services for Nursing homes, including chefs, kitchen assistants, and kitchen porters.

Services.name: RECEPTIONIST
Services.text: Queen Health Care provides all front of house reception services, being the first point of contact for guests and clients.
